Module devon.inventorymanager
Package devon.inventorymanager.controller

Class Add_Product_Controller

java.lang.Object
devon.inventorymanager.controller.Add_Product_Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Add_Product_Controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the Add_Product_Controller class. This class handles adding products checking for correct data types. It handles saving or canceling when adding products as well as associating parts with products.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This is the initialize method. this method is called during initialization and sets up default values of the ID text field and populate the available parts table.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location of the Add Product.fxml
      resourceBundle - The resource bundle used for initialization

    • onRemoveAssociatedPart

      public void onRemoveAssociatedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This is the onRemoveAssociatedPart method. This is and event handler method that is called when the user clicks remove associated part button. Removes a selected part from the products associated parts list. When a part is removed from a product the user must click ok to confirm.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the action event

    • onAddProductCancel

      public void onAddProductCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This is the onAddProductCancel method. This is an event handler method that is called if the user clicks the cancel button when on the add product screen. The product will not be added and the application returns to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered when the cancel button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onaddProductSave

      public void onaddProductSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This is the onaddProductSave method. This is an event handler method that is called when the user clicks the save button after adding a new product. It retrieves values from the text fields converts them and checks for correct data types and then adds them to the inventory it also adds associated parts to the product.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the save button.

    • onAddPartToProduct

      public void onAddPartToProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This is the onAddPartToProduct method. This method adds the selected parts to the associated parts list of the product When the add button is clicked this method is called it adds the selected part from the available parts table to the associated parts list of the product being created.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the add button.

    • onSearchAddProduct

      public void onSearchAddProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This is the onSearchAddProduct method. This method is called when a user performs a search for a part to add to a product. It searches by ID or partial name and updates the available parts table with matches.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the search action
